betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The unseen threads controlling the universe. The masterminds of tragedy. The artificers of downfall.
The Crimson Cult, the silent destroyers of the Twilight Forest. The hidden rules of much of the universe, here, on the dead soil of Akathartos, rule from the height of might, and show their true face, unmasked, and marked by darkness.
True darkness. Recursive darkness. 
The primal darkness in the heart of every person, of every consciousness, when they realize other people, other consciousness, can be used, exploited, manipulated.
That is the darkness that drives the crimson cult. The darkness that ruined lives without them even knowing.
An evil that defeated many, and that shall now be defeated.
At all costs.
